name: Elevator control system
short_description:
==Bit Control System Enterprises==
'''Bit Control System Enterprises''' (BCSE) is a '''[http://www.bcse.co.in microcontroller]''' based company providing solutions to home, industries and other segments and implement customized solutions for embedded and computer based software. They use programs languages like C, C++, C# which makes their products transportable across the microprocessor/microcontroller families. BCSE manufacture, supply and provide services of micro-controller based solutions for all sections of activities, offering a wide range of products like elevator control system, Elevator Displays, Operating panels etc.. 

'''Elevator Controllers'''
On June 15, 2012 BCSE entered the market with their  elevator control system based on latest microcontroller using Serial and Parallel communication technology, and then they introduce their '''[http://www.bcse.co.in/products/elevator-controller/automatic-rescue-device ARD (automatic rescue device)]''' systems on April 30, 2012.
